name: Doodle Slime
description:
Doodle Slime is a simple game where you, a slime, have to jump from platform to platform to avoid the shredder that is eating your world - the paper - away.

This game is the result of an assignment from my ITGM 220 class at SCAD and was made for educational purposes. The game itself was made in Processing 4.0, with assets from Adobe Stock (educational license) as well as assets made by myself in Procreate.
